page.title: 17THE MORETON MASSEY
page.content: The Moreton Massey is a freehouse. Beer is a very popular drink and many different types are sold for up to nearly a pound a pint. He sells a variety of white and red wines from many countries as well as the local wine from Greens Vineyard. The average price is 6 pounds a bottle.He also sells Champagne and spirits. Round the bar are small tables where people eat bar snacks, which include open sandwiches,ploughmans lunches, various foods on toast and salads. The price of a bar snack is from 80p.to Â£3 The restaurant serves 3 course meals. The average price for a meal is Â£10. Specialities include: Avocado with prawns,Mushrooms sauted in garlic, Fresh salmon, Grilled Dover sole, Massey gateaux.
